testcase.classname: To Validate forgotten password functionality of facebook app
testcase.system-out: Given User have to Launch the FaceBook Application through Chrome Browser...passed And User have click the forgotten password..................................passed When User have to enter the email or phno...................................passed Then User have to click search button.......................................passed

Given User have to Launch the FaceBook Application through Chrome Browser...passed When User have to Enter the InValid Email and Invalid Password..............passed And User have to Click the Login button.....................................passed Then User have to reach Invalid Credential Page.............................passed
